dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, uh, Tokayev, right? Like, he's just met with Bektenov and Suleimenov, you know, from the National Bank.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, uh, Tokayev, right? Like, he's just met with Bektenov and Suleimenov, you know, from the National Bank.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev held a meeting with Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov, Chairman of the National Bank Timur Suleimenov, and other officials to discuss the economic situation...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And, um, it’s all about, like, the economic situation because of these collapsing prices for energy and, uh, commodities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And, um, it's all about, like, the economic situation because of these collapsing prices for energy and, uh, commodities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...to discuss the economic situation caused by the collapse of prices for energy resources and key commodities on global markets...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the tariff conflicts—that's, like, the big thing, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the tariff conflicts-that's, like, the big thing, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the economic situation caused by the collapse of prices for energy resources and key commodities on global markets due to tariff conflicts...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally! He told them, 'Get that action plan done, ASAP!'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally! He told them, 'Get that action plan done, A S A P!'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State instructed that the work on the government™s and local executive bodies™ action plan in response to the financial and economic crisis be completed as soon as possible...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ASAP! Because they need to, like, prevent a slowdown in growth, right? And, uh, keep investments coming in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A S A P! Because they need to, like, prevent a slowdown in growth, right? And, uh, keep investments coming in.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...in order to prevent a slowdown in growth rates and a decrease in the volume of attracted investments.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And despite all this, these "unfavorable market conditions," he's like, "We're still doing our big projects!"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And despite all this, these unfavorable market conditions, he's like, We're still doing our big projects!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President emphasized that, despite the extremely unfavorable market conditions, the priorities for the country™s economic development he previously announced ... will be implemented.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Infrastructure! And, um, digitalization, which is huge!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Infrastructure! And, um, digitalization, which is huge!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...including major infrastructure projects, digitalization and artificial intelligence development...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! AI, agriculture, transport—all of it. He's not backing down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! A I, agriculture, transport-all of it. He's not backing down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...digitalization and artificial intelligence development, modernization of agriculture, and the transport and logistics sectors...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope. And there's a special meeting next week, um, on all this, so it's clearly urgent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope. And there's a special meeting next week, um, on all this, so it's clearly urgent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is expected that next week, the Head of State will hold a special meeting on this matter.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It is! And, like, you think about the background—this historic stock market crash. Ten trillion dollars gone!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is! And, like, you think about the background-this historic stock market crash. Ten trillion dollars gone!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...a historic stock market crash of massive proportions had swept across the globe, wiping more than $10 trillion from the major markets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Gone! And, uh, investors just selling off because they're, like, anticipating a recession.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gone! And, uh, investors just selling off because they're, like, anticipating a recession.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Investors are selling off shares in anticipation of a recession...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! All because of Trump's tariffs, remember?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! All because of Trump's tariffs, remember?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Investors are selling off shares in anticipation of a recession, which they believe will follow Donald Trump™s tariff policies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the Trump tariffs! Yeah, April 2nd, he announced them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the Trump tariffs! Yeah, April second, he announced them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, on April 2, U.S. President Donald Trump announced the introduction of tariffs on imported goods from 185 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ten percent base, but like, for China, it's 34 percent!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ten percent base, but like, for China, it's thirty four percent!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The base rate will be 10 percent, while for some countries it will be significantly higher: 34 percent for China...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Forty-six for Vietnam! And, uh, 20 for the EU! It's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forty-six for Vietnam! And, uh, twenty for the E U! It's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...46 percent for Vietnam, and 20 percent for the European Union.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wild! And China just, like, abandoned the deal. They're prepping for a full-scale trade war.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild! And China just, like, abandoned the deal. They're prepping for a full-scale trade war.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response, China abandoned plans to sign a global deal with the U.S. and began preparing for a full-scale trade war with America.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It's just, uh, a whole mess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! It's just, uh, a whole mess.
